metadata.title: CVE-2022-4365 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 11.8 before 15.5.7, all versions starting from 15.6 before15.6.4, all versions starting from 15.7 before 15.7.2. A maliciousMaintainer can leak the sentry token by changing the configured URL in theSentry error tracking settings page.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
